content: We are trying to full the valueset http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/vaccines-gps-uv-ips from tx.fhir.org http://tx.fhir.org/r4/ValueSet?_format=json&url=http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/vaccines-gps-uv-ips but the result shows that valueset does not exist. @Rob Hausam Is there some place we get access the value set expansion? @Paul Denning

@Yunwei Wang @Paul Denning You can include the valueSet itself as a parameter in the $expand request, which is typically what the IG Publisher does. Doing it that way the value set itself isn't persisted. But we can (and probably should) look at giving the IPS value sets more of a permanent home where they can be accessed.
